name: cli
description: This is the CLI client of the Song Rating environment for Cider2. It communicate with your [Song Rating API](https://github.com/chikatetsu/song-rating-server) running on your server to rate your songs. Simply listen to your music on your Cider2 application, and say if the current song playing is better or worse than the previous song using the `Page Up` and `Page Down` button on your keyboard. The response of the API will be displayed on the console running the CLI.
